member.name: P:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.loglevel
member.summary:
Gets or sets set logging level used by the library.
Default: panic
Range: from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.logflags
member.summary: Gets or sets set logging flags used by the library.

member.name: T:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.loglevelEnum
member.summary: Set logging level used by the library enum.

member.name: F:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.loglevelEnum.quiet
member.summary: quiet [-8]: Show nothing at all; be silent.

member.name: F:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.loglevelEnum.panic
member.summary: panic [0]: Only show fatal errors which could lead the process to crash, such as an assertion failure. This is not currently used for anything.

member.name: F:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.loglevelEnum.fatal
member.summary: fatal [8]: Only show fatal errors. These are errors after which the process absolutely cannot continue.

member.name: F:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.loglevelEnum.error
member.summary: error [16]: Show all errors, including ones which can be recovered from.

member.name: F:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.loglevelEnum.warning
member.summary: warning [24]: Show all warnings and errors. Any message related to possibly incorrect or unexpected events will be shown.

member.name: F:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.loglevelEnum.info
member.summary: info [32]: Show informative messages during processing. This is in addition to warnings and errors. This is the default value.

member.name: F:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.loglevelEnum.verbose
member.summary: verbose [40]: Same as info, except more verbose.

member.name: F:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.loglevelEnum.debug
member.summary: debug [48]: Show everything, including debugging information.

member.name: T:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.logflagsEnum
member.summary: Set logging flags used by the library flags.

member.name: F:Emby.Ffmpeg.Model.Options.GlobalOptionsCore.logflagsEnum.repeat
member.summary: repeat: RD optimal MB level residual skipping.
